locations.description: You are by a stream.  All is beautiful.
You are in a strange room with unfamiliar apparatus!
This is room number three.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number four.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number five.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number six.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number seven.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number eight.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number nine.  But the player would see something far more sexy!
This is room number ten.  But the player would see something far more sexy!

items.name: key
items.details: A shiney shiney beautiful key.  You know you want it!

items.name: boulder
items.details: Actually it's not big, it's huge!  You won't be able to lift it but you could probably climb on it.

items.name: monkey
items.details:
The monkey looks at you and pulls a face!

This is a very naughty monkey!

items.name: wick
items.description: This looks a lot like a candle wick.
items.details: A regular wick.  If you had some matches you could light it!

items.name: flame
items.details: Actually this isn't a flame, it's a wick that is alight!
